info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued November 18 at 3:38PM MST until November 18 at 6:45PM MST by NWS Flagstaff AZ
info.description:
FFWFGZ
The National Weather Service in Flagstaff has issued a
* Flash Flood Warning for Big Bug Creek and the Agua Fria River in Yavapai County in west central Arizona...
* Until 645 PM MST.
* At 338 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly.
HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding.
SOURCE...Radar indicated.
IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, normally dry washes, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses.
* Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Prescott Valley, Dewey-Humboldt, Mayer, Spring Valley, Cordes Lakes, Agua Fria National Monument, Poland Junction, Cordes Junction and Arcosanti.
This includes the following highways... State Route 69 between mile markers 263 and 284. Interstate 17 between mile markers 261 and 268.
This includes the following creeks, washes and rivers... Lynx Creek, Sycamore Creek, Cedar Creek, Big Bug Creek, Agua Fria River, Little Wolf Creek, Hackberry Creek, Antelope Creek, Badger Spring Wash, Chaparral Gulch, Dry Creek, Brushy Wash, Ash Creek, Wolf Creek, Grapevine Creek, Little Ash Creek, Yarber Wash and Osborne Spring Wash.
info.instruction: Flooding of washes and creeks will occur, some dirt roads will become muddy and impassable. Paved roads and underpasses could become flooded as well.

parameter.value: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 6:45 PM MST. Avoid flooded areas.

National Weather Service: A FLASH FLOOD WARNING is in effect for this area until 6:45 PM MST. This is a dangerous and life-threatening situation. Do not attempt to travel unless you are fleeing an area subject to flooding or under an evacuation order.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS hasta 6:45 PM MST. Evite areas inundadas.

Servicio Nacional de Meteorologia: AVISO DE INUNDACIONES REPENTINAS en efecto para esta area hasta las 6:45 PM MST. Esta es una situacion peligrosa y amenaza la vida. No intente viajar a menos que sea para abandonar un area propensa a inundaciones o bajo una orden de desalojo.
